value.title: StarCraft 2: How-to Improve & Efficiently Practice! (Guide)
value.excerpt: Practicing a lot and practicing efficiently are two seperate things. In this video I go over how I improve in StarCraft 2, and how to make the most of your practice time.  The basic idea is to have a certain goal in mind when playing the game. A lot of people complain that they have a hard time laddering
